issue.title: war files of 4.0.2 have uppercase on first letter
issue.body:
**Original author :** Blatti Yves

Same as #675 for 4.0.1
War files of 4.0.2 ( in https://forge.easysdi.org/projects/easysdi/files) have first letter in uppercase.
If you download it and deploy it "as is" in tomcat, the context will be http://myserver:8080/Proxy instead of http://myserver:8080/proxy for example.



**Fixed versions :** 4.1.0

comments.body:
**Original author :** Magoni Bruno

War files are temporarily renamed with lower case until fixing build process
